name: CIVA
0:
”Alexa, open CIVA application”
”Alexa, start CIVA application”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: civa application
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use the power of voice to document, manage, and stay up to date on your jobsite using the Alexa Voice feature connected to your mobile device. You can get started by saying: 
“Alexa, Open CIVA Application”
“Alexa, Launch CIVA Application”
